text: Benedetta is a 2021 French Dutch biographical drama movie directed by Paul Verhoeven and is based on the 1986 novel by Judith C. Brown. It stars Virginie Efira, Lambert Wilson, Daphne Patakia, Charlotte Rampling, Olivier Rabourdin, Clotilde Courau, Herv√© Pierre. ==Other websites== * Category:2021 drama movies Category:2020s LGBT movies Category:2020s biographical movies Category:French drama movies Category:French biographical movies Category:French LGBT movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Dutch LGBT movies Category:Dutch biographical movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Belgian LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Paul Verhoeven Category:Movies set in the 17th century
